meanings.definition: A person who writes or inscribes letters.
meanings.sent1: The letterers carefully wrote each word on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The letterers addressed the envelopes with neat handwriting.
meanings.sent3: The letterers had a competition to see who could write the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The letterers' pens danced across the page, creating beautiful words.
meanings.sent5: The letterers' precise strokes made the letters stand out on the page.

meanings.definition: A person who specializes in creating letterforms for use in graphic design or typography.
meanings.sent1: The graphic designer hired talented letterers to design unique fonts.
meanings.sent2: The typography company employed skilled letterers to create custom typefaces.
meanings.sent3: The letterers joked that they could write letters in their sleep.
meanings.sent4: The letterers' creativity knew no bounds when designing new fonts.
meanings.sent5: The letterers' attention to detail resulted in stunning typographic designs.
